inclusion.criterion: neonates or Infants who visited the out-patient clinic with nonpalpable or undescended
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: neonates or Infants aged from 6months to 18months with normal testis (volunteers, Group3)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous history of abdomen or inguinal area surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: children diagnosed with epididymitis or orchitis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: infants with premature (<37 weeks) birth history
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side.
